xliffFileTranslator.title: XLIFF File Translator

featureCards.lightningFastDescription: Get instant translations in multiple languages with high accuracy.
featureCards.multipleLanguagesDescription: Support for over 100 languages with high accuracy translation.
featureCards.secureReliableDescription: Your files are processed securely and never stored on our servers.

dropzone.dragDrop: Drag & drop an XLIFF file here, or click to select

heroTitle: Your Ultimate Tool for Seamless Translation and Localization
heroSubtitle: Translate and localize your content effortlessly, powered by Google Translate API. Perfect for developers, translators, content creators and businesses.
multiLanguageSupportDesc: Support for over 100 languages with high accuracy translations
translationMemoryDesc: Save time with reusable translations and consistent terminology.
qualityAssuranceDesc: Automated QA checks to ensure accurate and consistent translations.
lightningFastDesc: Get instant translations for your files with our optimized processing engine
developersDesc: Localize your apps with support for XLIFF, JSON, and strings.xml.
translatorsDesc: Simplify your workflow with real-time collaboration and translation memory.
businessesDesc: Expand your global reach with accurate and consistent translations.
contentCreatorsDesc: Localize your content for a global audience with ease.
uploadYourFileDesc: Upload your XLIFF, JSON, or strings.xml file.
selectLanguageDesc: Choose the source and target languages.
translateDesc: Use our powerful translation tools to localize your content.
downloadDesc: Download the translated file and integrate it into your project.
supportUsDesc: If you appreciate our services and want to support us, consider signing up!
ctaTitle: Ready to Simplify Your Localization Workflow?
ctaDesc: Join our community of developers, translators, and businesses who trust LocalizeStrings.com for their translation needs.
